internal.description: Whether or not this should be fulfilled by an internal load balancer (e.g. no public IP)

hostZone.description: The DNS zone that the ingress rule listens for traffic on (only works w/ application load balancers)

path.description: The path that the ingress rule listens for traffic on (only works w/ application load balancers)

protocol.description: Protocol that the ingress rule listens for traffic on

subdomain.description: The DNS subdomain that the ingress rule listens for traffic on (only works w/ application load balancers)

loadBalancer.description: ID of the load balancer to use for this ingress rule

namespace.description: Namespace to put the ingress rule in

port.description: Port that the ingress rule listens for traffic on

service.description: Service the ingress forwards traffic to
